article_title: German Police Arrest Two After Terror Tip
article_text:
BERLIN—German police arrested two men with links to the Islamist scene and conducted two antiterror raids in Berlin on Thursday after a tip-off that a terror attack might have been planned, spokesmen for the Berlin police and prosecutor said.

The raids carried out by more than 300 police officers come as Europe is on high alert following the Paris terrorist attacks of Nov. 13 and the lockdown of Brussels over the past days following...
